metadata.synopsis: Player clicks on an 'aquarium' that has floating brains inside.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Touch aquarium objects in TUT_Avernus_C like the one in -5; 17; -411

1.text: Nothing but brains. Food for mind flayers, I suppose.
